ProductInfo.Features:
Supports Plug and play port forwarding automatically on the router
Support waterproof level IP66 for outdoor use
36pcs IR LEDs, Night Vision up to 25 Meters,control through the photoresistor automatically
Build in WIFI module, support 802.11b/g/n, easy for connecting wireless route
Compatible with iPhone and Android device, Support mobile phone and table PC to view.Provide free LiveIPC Monitor Software
